data.name: Warfare Online - Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Founder's Pack for Warfare Online is a discounted collection of Premium and Gold. Kick start your progression and collection with this pack.

THE FOUNDER'S PACK CONTAINS:


PREMIUM ACCOUNT for 60 DAYS

With Premium account access for 60 Days, you can kick start your progression through the Units and Nations, giving you quicker access to higher tier Unlocks.


PREMIUM CURRENCY - 2000 GOLD

The Gold in the pack can be used to buy and open a number of Supply Boxes, giving you a stack of Support Assets and Operations to start creating more effective Platoons. Or if you're looking to stand out, you can use Gold to purchase Premium Skins for your Infantry and Vehicles.


EXCLUSIVE "GULF" SKIN FOR THE M1A1 TANK

This skin will only ever be available in the Founder's Pack. Based on markings seen on M1A1s during the Gulf War, this battle worn and customized tank skin will set yours apart from the others.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 at 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 at 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630, 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 at 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 at 3.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
